Reviews.Title: “excellent location”
Reviews.Author: cathy183
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend january 2012 daughters aged 12 9 experience hotel excellently located 3 mins trevi fountain spacious double bed single beds couch fridge safe tv arrival ill friendly owner bottles water chambermaid check 1130 am free wifi excellent added bonus breakfast cafe 50 paces front door hotel staff available questions times extremely friendly hotel changed hands months ago advise ignore reviews dated highly recommend definately return clean spacious friendly helpful atmosphere times cathy rachel cork ireland

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable price, perfect location”
Reviews.Author: alexalaf
Reviews.Content: perfect location center rome walking distance fontana di trevi colosseo pantheon via del corso 3 stations vatican city reasonable price helpful receptionists speaking perfect english equipment clean heating cable tv free wifi disadvantages noise hear noise reception provided basics breakfast poor coffee snack spacious worth money dont mind disadvantages

Reviews.Title: “Location”
Reviews.Author: Laura C
Reviews.Content: location staff helpful super nice typical 2 stars clean comfortable breakfast included brioche super sweet dont croissants mean deal morning sugary overall recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great location at a very good price”
Reviews.Author: Baksetesjaforen
Reviews.Content: hotel average clean staff friendly helpfull location superb dont cheap hotels own bathroom standard metro stop barberini 510 mins walk vatican trevi fountain spanish steps walk trevi probably 10 mins walk colosseum probably half hour walk catching metro prob thats barberini change termini stop colosseum hotel street traffic noice bit hard sign look square gold sign hotel written confused bit theres 3 hotels using entrance reception elevator coolest elevator 3rd floor restaurants bars corner towards trevi bit touristy expensive via del tritone called white friday atmosphere music saturday prices gone disco corner cosy barrestaurant amazing staff fantastic drinks worth visit theres bar basically hotel entrance set stairs noice called bell 5 morning people tho atmosphere dont night worst enjoy rome

Reviews.Title: “Shady management - BEWARE”
Reviews.Author: nrowens
Reviews.Content: hotel charged credit card authorization additional tax included agreement hotelscom travelers hotel makes people aware charge booked included total stated included taxes fees printout hotel management discussing hotel management hour agreed charged paid amount agreement days contacting authorization hotel management secretly charged debit card additional tax wasnt card checking card months reservation tax minimal amount am shocked management charge consent authorization especially agreeing charged checked unethical dispute bank recommend staying due shady business practices hotel management

Reviews.Title: “nice one star hotel in central rome”
Reviews.Author: robertsen21
Reviews.Content: hotel specious helpfull staff free water soft drinks convenience price 1 min metro 3 min trevi fountain via veneto steps location shopping reception 24 hours clean bathroom white bedsheets towels hotel offer star hotel win location

Reviews.Title: “PRIME location but a rundown place”
Reviews.Author: Cousinavi
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2010 2 nights rome trip extended layover chance look magnificent city knowing hotel served purpose simply 2 blocks barbarini metro station 2 blocks trevi fountain train 4 stops colleseum 3 vatican prime location especially price similar hotels 200300 usd 87 cheaper hotel ghetto hang hat nights sleep check city knowing serves purpose perfect wouldnt stay couple nights looking enjoy city cheap price dont expect comes hotels
